Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI provides very detailed and in-depth feedback on how I can improve my work, but most of the times teachers only provide a brief generalised feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAi has most of the time been very objective, while teachers can sometimes be subjective in their opinions.
